scripts.dev: npm run build-python && npm run dev-ui
scripts.dev-cuda: npm run build-python-cuda && npm run dev-ui
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-python && npm run vite-build && npm run tauri build
scripts.build-cuda: npm run clean && npm run build-python-cuda && npm run vite-build && npm run tauri build
scripts.release: npm run build && python zip.py --zip_name VRCT.zip
scripts.release-cuda: npm run build-cuda && python zip.py --zip_name VRCT_cuda.zip
scripts.release-all: npm run release && npm run release-cuda
